name: Phaethon's Melody
desc4: When any squad member uses an <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct>, the equipper's Anomaly Proficiency increases by 45 for 8s. If the character using the <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct> is not the equipper, the equipper's <ct color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</ct> is increased by 25%.
story: A peculiar Drive Disc created by fanatical followers of Phaethon. The eccentric singer repeats an odd melody with a strange voice, striving to spread the legendary deeds of "Lord Phaethon."
